dialogue.text: D-Dad?! What's happening?! Why do you look like that?!
Jas... I feel her... that cold, empty feeling... It's...
Well, well. Look what Ego's little castaway dragged in. And you brought my... favorite broken plaything.
Tell me, little Camille... can you feel the despair radiating from your precious PJ's father? Does it remind you of anything?
Leave her ALONE, you monster! Dad! Fight it! Don't listen to her!
